borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
site_name: Fulham Gas WorksImperial RoadLondon
description: Non-Material Amendment to Reserved Matters Application (Ref. 2021/03976/RES) dated 4 April 2022 for the 'Reserved Matters Application relating to the approval of access; appearance; landscaping; layout and scale in respect of Phase 3b (Development Plot E1) for the erection of a building comprising residential floorspace with associated landscaping and play space, in compliance with Condition 1 (Reserved Matters Details) and Condition 5 (Design Codes, Development Specification and Parameter Plans) of planning permission 2018/02100/COMB granted 8 February 2019 (a comprehensive residential led mixed use redevelopment of the former Gasworks Site)(as amended by Non-Material Amendment applications Ref 2021/01078/NMAT granted 16 December 2021 and Ref 2022/02649/NMAT granted 2 December 2022).' with amendments sought to Condition 1 (Drawings). Proposed amendments have resulted from a need to provide access to two staircases from each upper level within Plot E1, as a result of changes to fire safety regulations and guidance. Amendments include separated escape routes from above ground and below ground; ventilated lobbies to all corridors with sterilised Lift Lobbies housing no accommodation access; disabled Refuges within the lift lobby at basement and all upper levels. These changes result in some elevational changes which also include changes to location of rain water pipes.
